items.title: Awesome Flame
items.content_text:

items.title: Awesome Security
items.content_text:
### Network / Scanning / Pentesting

*   [Deepfence SecretScanner (⭐3.2k)](https://github.com/deepfence/SecretScanner) - Find secrets and passwords in container images and file systems.

### Network / Full Packet Capture / Forensic

*   [Deepfence PacketStreamer (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/deepfence/PacketStreamer) - High-performance remote packet capture and collection tool, distributed tcpdump for cloud native environments.
items.content_html:
Network / Scanning / Pentesting

  • Deepfence SecretScanner (⭐3.2k) - Find secrets and passwords in container images and file systems.

Network / Full Packet Capture / Forensic

  • Deepfence PacketStreamer (⭐1.9k) - High-performance remote packet capture and collection tool, distributed tcpdump for cloud native environments.

items.title: Awesome Symfony
items.content_text:
### Recipes

*   [Symfony Recipes (⭐1k)](https://github.com/symfony/recipes) - Symfony recipes allow the automation of Composer packages configuration via the Symfony Flex Composer plugin.
*   [Symfony Recipes (Contrib) (⭐544)](https://github.com/symfony/recipes-contrib) - Symfony recipes allow the automation of Composer packages configuration via the Symfony Flex Composer plugin.
items.content_html:
Recipes

  • Symfony Recipes (⭐1k) - Symfony recipes allow the automation of Composer packages configuration via the Symfony Flex Composer plugin.
  • Symfony Recipes (Contrib) (⭐544) - Symfony recipes allow the automation of Composer packages configuration via the Symfony Flex Composer plugin.
